Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated base image in Dockerfile to `ghcr.io/github/gh-base-image/gh-base-noble:20251006-204801-gaa06a8885`
- Replaced hardcoded "GitHub", "github.com", and "Github" references in Copilot CLI documentation with Liquid variables:
  - Standardized to `{% data variables.product.github %}` and `{% data variables.product.prodname_dotcom_the_website %}`
  - Corrected "github actions" → `{% data variables.product.prodname_actions %}` branding
- Fixed inconsistent capitalization of GitHub product names

### Title
Update base image and standardize GitHub branding in Copilot docs
